subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: I climbed into the driver's seat of a Nextel Cup-style stock car as part of the Richard Petty Driving Experience. I just wanted to release my inner Speed Racer.
snippet: I climbed into the driver's seat of a Nextel Cup-style stock car as part of the Richard Petty Driving Experience. I just wanted to release my inner Speed Racer.
